lead_paragraph: The former ESPN baseball analyst Harold Reynolds sued the sports network for at least $5 million yesterday, saying he was wrongly fired after a female intern complained about what Reynolds called a “brief and innocuous” hug. An ESPN spokesman said that the network stood by its decision to terminate his contract.
